descriptionHtml:
TacitRed CrowdStrike IOC Automation provides a Logic App playbook that automatically syncs compromised credential indicators from TacitRed to CrowdStrike Falcon.

This solution includes:

  • Playbook: TacitRedToCrowdStrike - Fetches TacitRed findings and creates IOCs in CrowdStrike

Key Features:

  • Automated IOC synchronization every 6 hours
  • Domain and URL IOC creation from compromised credentials
  • Enriched IOC descriptions with stealer, credential, and machine details
  • CrowdStrike OAuth2 authentication
